## FiletreeBuilderOptions.filesystem property

Filesystem adapter for file operations (required).

**Signature:**

```typescript
filesystem: FileSystemAdapter;
```

## Remarks

Provides filesystem operations like reading directories and checking file stats. Use the adapter from `@boba-cli/machine`<!-- -->.
